page.title: 05GAMES AND PASTIMES
page.content: Various games and pastimes take place.The most popular are the following. {Football }Two teams play regularly during the winter months. Thay belong to a local league. {Skittles}The skittles team meet and play at the Winkleigh Hotel.They travel to other villages to play against other teams.{ {Bowling}.A large number of people play this game throughout North Devon. {Darts}take place at the Seven Stars public house.They have one team. {Snooker}is played at the Castle School snooker hall three times a week. This club has 25 members. They hold tournaments. {Tennis}is played at the recreation field on a friendly basis
